description:
The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Ky eshte aplikacioni zyrtar i Federates Shqiptare te Futbollit 

Ketu do te gjieni informacione te pergjithshme lidhur me federaten, strukturat e saj, mbi kampionatet, dhe mbi skuadren Kombetare te Futbollit. 

Ne seksionin Kombetarja jane te paraqitur te gjithe kampionatet ku Skuadra Kombetare e futbollit eshte pjesemarrese. Pas zgjedhjes se nje kampionati, mund te shikoni informacione te detajuara te tij. 

Ne kete aplikacion mund te shikoni kalendarin e ndeshjeve te secilit kampionat, duke e shfletuar ne seksionin Me teper, ose duke kerkuar per ta.  Gjithashtu ju mund te shikoni edhe ndeshjet sipas diteve. 

Jane te paraqitur per secilen ndeshje formacionet, historia e ndeshjes me te gjithe eventet, rezultatet, stadiumi dhe gjithashtu  informacion i detajuar mbi lojtaret ne profilin e nje lojtari.

Ju gjithashtu mund te blini bileta apo cdo artukull tjeter nga Dyqani i FSHF.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy

The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.
Celebrities and prestigious nominees from the football world will once again attend the yearly event.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:
- Vote for your favourite football stars
- Predict scores from the major leagues
- Keep track of the nominees and winners

The 433 app is the ultimate football experience for every football lover. Whether you want to keep track of your team’s big match, stay up to date with all the latest news, kick back and watch some epic viral videos or simply test your footy knowledge with a variety of games… We’ve got you covered. Welcome to the home of football.


MATCH CENTRE
Find everything you need on matchday – fixtures, results, match stats, live line-ups – and get notifications when your teams score. Which team dominated possession? Who had the highest xG? How many of their shots were on target? How many yellow cards did the referee give? It’s all there, and more. 


PREDICTIONS
Think you ‘know ball’ better than your friends? Here’s your chance to prove it! Create leaderboards with your friends and go head-to-head in daily predictions of matches from across the world. Enter into the general leaderboards and compete against all 433 users, with the chance to win prizes.


WALLPAPERS
Need a new football background for your phone? This is the app for you. Wallpapers are released every week, covering all the biggest players, clubs and national sides.


QUIZZES
Put your football knowledge to the test with a series of quizzes, interactive games and brain teasers. Want to find out who knows more about football: You or your friends? You can! Add your friends, complete quizzes, and keep track of each other’s ‘ball knowledge’ with leaderboards.


NEWS
Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favourite clubs and leagues. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes and reactions from across the football world. Be the first to find out about trending stories or when a transfer is nearing that all important ‘Here we go!’


VIRALS
Want to see goals, saves, moments from games across the world? Want to feel the game from the fan’s perspective? Or do you just want to see some funny moments from famous players and coaches? Then look no further. Find daily uploads of viral moments from across the beautiful game!

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Futbol24 – your favorite livescore app is back with a new design and improved navigation features!

Organize your fixtures with the integrated timeline, manage your personal calendar and plan your favorite fixtures well into the future. Receive live information on in-play action in European top divisions such as the Premier League, La Liga and Serie A. Follow soccer fixtures in international competitions and domestic leagues in Africa, Asia, North- and South America and Oceania – Futbol24 has it all.          

Live – your soccer overview

Keep track of all the ongoing in-play action in our livescore app, and get notified about important events of your choice in real-time. The newly designed menu has improved the app's usability and will make it easier for you to find exactly what you need. 

Favorites – your favorite teams and competitions

Select your favorite teams and leagues and receive a notification as soon as anything happens in a match with your team involved. To mark a fixture or a team, simply swipe right, and your selection will be added to your list of favorites. This way, you will always stay up to date about your favorite teams' performances, as you won't miss out on any goals, bookings or red cards.  

Discover over 2000 leagues

Explore live score information about soccer fixtures in over 2000 leagues worldwide. For each league and competition, Futbol24 provides you with a comprehensive league table including matches played, points, goal difference as well as with stats for individual matches and prior encounters between teams.

Profile

For a broad selection of countries, Futbol24 also offers livescore info on more than just the top division. Fans of football in England, for instance, can follow live action in 25 different competitions from the Premier League to the Women's Super League. To keep a good overview, simply select individual teams and competitions that you want to follow as favorites (e.g. Premier League, African Nations Cup, CAF Champions League, La Liga, Premier League Kenya and many more). These will then appear in your personal “favorites” section, which you can tailor to your needs. If you choose to follow the Kenyan Premier League for instance, your Futbol24 app will provide you with detailed live score info on all KPL fixtures.


Free push notifications

You can further personalize the way you want to be notified about different in-play events. Choose from a variety of different push notification sounds for goals, bookings, half time and full time scores, and many more. If you want none of that, you can also select silent mode or vibration. Futbol24 enables you personalize every aspect of your soccer livescore experience. 

Feedback

Help us improve. By rating our app and by giving us feedback, you can help improve the best soccer livescore app even further. To give feedback and to rate Futbol24, just visit the profile section in the app.

What are you waiting for? Download the Futbol24 app today and enjoy the best and fastest live score app on the market!

Lets Go Gym's Lets Go Gym app is a user-friendly software developed to help you make the best use of the services provided by your sports club while training.

With the Lets Go Gym Program, all of your sport life is at your fingertips:

FACILITY AREA: It allows you to track all the services offered by your club with one program.
QR MOBILE: You can use Smart Mobile QR at the entrance and exit of your sports club, in the locker rooms, and in club transactions with the E-Wallet.
Appointments: You can track all the appointments made in your name at the sports club with one program.
PT Sessions
Studio Classes
Spa Reservations
All scheduled appointments and group lessons
Workouts: In this section, you can visually review over 1500 exercises you will do at your sports club, track your special workout program and daily regional development.
Diet List: You can access the diet list specially created for you by your sports club and follow your healthy nutrition program.
RESULTS: You can track your body and fat measurements taken at the sports club through the system.
Subscriptions: You can track your sports subscription, see how many days are left, see remaining sessions, learn about current packages and price lists.
Club Information: You can see the information about your sports club and how many people are currently active.
Notifications: You can follow all notifications provided by your sports center through the program.
More: You can use all system requirements with the technologies offered by Lets Go Gym company and benefit from privileges.
WHY SHOULD I USE THE MAKSIGYM APPLICATION?

Lets Go Gym program is not only a professional tracking system that you can use to follow your personal development step by step, but also a healthy lifestyle program that provides every detail, even your water needs.

WORKOUT MODULE: With this module, you can select your daily workouts, review them in a lively way with images, and track your sets as you perform each movement correctly. After each exercise, the system automatically switches to the next exercise, while you mark the movement you have finished and can make regional work.

CLUB PROGRAMS: You can follow the functional work assigned to you by your club and thus benefit from personalized and complete training including strength exercises, group lessons and all kinds of sports activities.
BODY MEASUREMENTS: You can track your measurements (weight, body fat, etc.) and control your progress over time.
APPOINTMENT: You can easily find and reserve your club's private lessons and create appointments. Do not forget that there is an infrastructure that will remind you of your reservations.
ACTIVITY: You can participate in activities organized by your facility.
All these personalized applications are the feature of Lets Go Gym App offered to you by Lets Go Gym Company.

AiScore is your Live score expert, bringing to you more information, more statistics and a completely new experience on your smartphone. Here you are even informed faster than the TV viewers!

With In-depth coverage of football, basketball, tennis and snooker, AiScore brings you live score,goals, yellow or red cards, H2H, fixtures, match live, team and player stats, standings, lineups and other important stats from English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, UEFA Champions League, NBA, FIBA, Basketball Champions League, ATP tennis, WTA tennis, World Snooker Championship - major or small leagues and competitions all over the world!

TOP HIGHLIGHTS:

*All Games - Follow all today's matches in real time. Also, you can check out the matches on specific day by DateTime Picker.

*Live - Stay up to date with all the latest scores and results from hundreds and thousands of games worldwide. Every score at a glance. Just tap the matchup for Box Score or Lineups, H2H and Match Live.

*Favorites - Choose your favorite team and competition on matchup and always be up-to-date.

*Instant Notification - Get instant notifications of goal, corner, red or yellow card, start, starting lineups and final results for all live or your followed matches. A pop-up window will appear to inform you of score changing when you turn on the "Score Reminder”.

*Leagues - In-depth coverage of leagues, cups and tournaments from over 200 countries. Check out latest rankings, standings, team or player stats and more.

Football: Over 2,600 different football matches, over 37,000 teams (including Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Championship and many more)

Basketball: Over 500 tournaments including FIBA Basketball World Cup, NBA, BCL

Tennis: Complete source for worldwide tennis matches including ATP, WTA

Snooker: Complete source for worldwide snooker matches including World Championship, UK Championship, Masters

*Chatroom - Get connected with other sports fans from all over the world. No game is boring if you can chat live.

*Language - 28 (more will be added)

Ready for the most action-packed soccer game ever? "Kick to Score! " is designed for soccer lovers who enjoy exciting challenges and skill-based gameplay.

Draw, Kick & Score!
Use your finger to draw the perfect path for the ball. Aim carefully, take the shot, and watch your ball fly into the goal. It’s simple, addictive, and fun for all ages!

Epic Soccer Adventures!
Play in unique locations like sandy beaches and bustling city streets. Each level brings a new challenge and an exciting soccer experience.

Action-Packed Soccer Fun!
If you love soccer, tricky football puzzles, and fun challenges, this game is for you. Download now and become the ultimate soccer champion!

Kick, score, and enjoy with "Kick to Score!." Your journey to football greatness starts now!

- About the App
Telegrafi Sport sjell për herë të parë një aplikacion të dedikuar vetëm për sportin — për të gjithë lexuesit besnikë që duan të jenë të parët me lajmet më të fundit, rezultatet live dhe historitë inspiruese të sportistëve shqiptarë dhe ndërkombëtarë.
Ky aplikacion është ndërtuar me dashuri për sportin dhe me teknologjinë më të fundit të Telegrafit, për t’u bërë platforma kryesore e çdo tifozi.

Main Features

- Çfarë ofron aplikacioni:
- Lajmet më të fundit sportive
 Qëndro i informuar me zhvillimet nga futbolli, basketbolli, sportet luftarake, eSports, Formula 1 dhe shumë më tepër.

- Live Score në kohë reale
 Rezultate, renditje dhe statistika të përditësuara për çdo ligë — nga Premier League deri te Superliga e Kosovës.

- Profile & Intervista ekskluzive
 Lexo rrëfime unike nga sportistë, trajnerë dhe personalitete të sportit, me intervista që nuk i gjen askund tjetër.

- Podcast: Arena e Yjeve
 Ndiq çdo javë podcastin zyrtar të Telegrafi Sport me diskutime, analiza dhe mysafirë të njohur nga bota e sportit.

- Njoftime (Notifications)
 Merr njoftime për rezultatet e ndeshjeve të skuadrës tënde, lajmet e fundit ose episodet e reja të podcasteve.

- Dizajn modern dhe navigim i lehtë
 Eksperiencë e shpejtë, intuitive dhe e optimizuar për përdorim në mobil.


Why Download Telegrafi Sport

- Pse ta shkarkosh:
Nëse ndjek sportin çdo ditë, Telegrafi Sport është aplikacioni që të mban gjithmonë në lojë.
 Nga ndeshjet e Premier League e deri te Kombëtarja e Kosovës, gjithçka që ndodh, e ke në xhep.

Your official home for European international football!

Follow the best of European international football with the official app, your essential companion for the UEFA Nations League, European Qualifiers for FIFA World Cup 2026, UEFA Women's Nations League and the Women's European Qualifiers for FIFA Women's World Cup 2027 – plus the road to UEFA EURO 2028! 

Stay up to date with all the action from both men's and women's national team competitions all year round. With the official app, you won't miss a moment of thrilling European international soccer!

Explore the UEFA Nations League and European Qualifiers:

Get comprehensive coverage
- Get live updates from every match across Europe's international football scene. See fixtures and results for all UEFA Nations League matches and European Qualifiers on the road to EURO 2028. Plus, don't miss a single score as teams bid to reach the FIFA World Cup 2026!

Track each team's progress
- Check group standings and see how your favourite men's national soccer teams are doing in the Nations League and the European Qualifiers for FIFA World Cup 2026.

Never miss a moment
- Don’t miss a single goal or key event thanks to real-time push notifications for line-up announcements, kick-offs, goals and draws.

Watch exciting videos
- Review goals in detail with next-day highlights and watch exclusive video replays on UEFA.tv. You'll also be able to enjoy exclusive longer-form soccer videos on UEFA.tv , including extended highlights, full match re-run videos and more!

Dig into the analysis
- Explore detailed stats, form guides, individual team pages, squads and player profiles for national teams competing in the Nations League and European Qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup 2026.

Stay informed
- Check the latest live scores and group standings – and access all fixtures and results across European international soccer competitions.

Unlock exclusive content
- Watch interviews with players, enjoy unique pitchside and crowd photos – and access UEFA.tv for exclusive football documentaries and behind-the-scenes content.

Personalise your experience
- Tailor your feed and notifications by selecting your favourite national soccer teams from both men's and women's competitions.

Follow women's international football:

- Check live scores and stats as the UEFA Women's Nations League reaches its climax. 

- Watch highlights of all the key matches in the Women's Nations League.

- Follow live results as teams compete to qualify for the FIFA Women's World Cup, held in Brazil in 2027.

- Relive the best moments and explore content from past tournaments like UEFA Women's EURO 2025 in Switzerland and UEFA Women's EURO 2022 in England. Stay updated with Women's European Qualifiers for FIFA Women's World Cup 2027 and other European football action.

The app is available in English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese and Russian.

Download the official UEFA EURO & Nations League app today and enjoy the best of European international football soccer for both men's and women's national teams!
